title: Rocky Mountain National Park: Rocky Mountain National Park Compendium
body: Rocky Mountain National Park Compendium       The compendium (3.12M pdf) is a compilation of special designations, closures, public use limits, permit requirements, and other restrictions imposed under the discretionary authority of the superintendent, in addition to what is contained in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Chapter 1, Parts 1 through 7 and 34) (4M pdf), and other applicable federal statutes and regulations.
